page.title: 19Schools in K.Lynn&S.Wootton
page.content: The County Primary school in our area is St.Edmund's.It was constituted into a primary school in 1984,having been separate infant and junior schools.It is situated on the A1078 leading into King's Lynn and its catchment area is the North Lynn estate.The children have to go under a subway to the school, as it is on the opposite side of the road.It became an all through primary school due to a drastic fall in numbers. The special school is the Alderman Jackson,it caters for children with severe mental and physical handicaps. It accepts children from a wide catch_ ment area-approx.15mlradius.The school is well supported locally and is well equipped with a wide range of thera- peutic toys and a hydrotherapy indoor pool,which can be used by physically handicapped from normal schools.
